title: Bug 118780: Set alias for columns in data set but in expression builder, still shows the old column names when selecting the dataset
OB: When selecting a dataset in the expression builder and double-clicking on the first column name, the original name of the column is displayed below the expression builder, while the alias name (row['column1']) is shown above the expression builder.
EB: According to scr 78193 in the tracker, the first column in the expression builder should use the alias name instead of the original name.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:  
1. Create a new data source and dataset.  
2. Set the alias of the first column in the dataset to 'column1'.  
3. Insert a data item and bind it to the dataset.  
4. Select the dataset in the expression builder and double-click on the first column name.
